Reviews.Title: Mixed feelings
Reviews.Author: S. Roberts
Reviews.Content: I had a Memoir before and it was real nice, but this one was trash in about 2 months. I don't know if this was a bad one, or if the other was an exceptionally good one. But I wouldn't take the chance again. Too much to pay for something that only lasted 2 months.

Reviews.Title: not a good phone.
Reviews.Author: melissa Sackett
Reviews.Content: i didn't like it because the internet never worked well on the phone, it smaller than what i expected, very difficult to use and to down load aps.
